title: Extinction Rebellion have turned climate change into a class war
text:
If Extinction Rebellion (XR) protesters were in any doubt of what many people privately think about them, they got a big reality check this morning when two of their activists jumped on top of a tube carriage at Canning Town. This “rebellion” barely lasted a few seconds before a tired commuter threw coffee at one and they were both dragged off.

Quite why the eco-rebels decided that disrupting public transport - surely one of the most environmentally-friendly inventions - was the best route to fight climate change, who knows. It was certainly not the way to enamour hard-working members of the public, many of whom do not have the luxury of hijacking the underground, and squatting in central London...
description: If Extinction Rebellion (XR) protesters were in any doubt of what many people privately think about them, they got a big reality check this morning when two of their activists jumped on top of a tube carriage at Canning Town.
